item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When did the future switch from being a promise to being a threat?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "My first time I jacked off, I thought I'd invented it. I looked down at my sloppy handful of junk and thought, This is going to make me rich." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only difference between a suicide and a martyrdom really is the amount of press coverage." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The truth is, every son raised by a single mom is pretty much born married. I don't know, but until your mom dies it seems like all the other women in your life can never be more than just your mistress." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Big Brother isn’t watching. He’s singing and dancing. He’s pulling rabbits out of a hat. Big Brother’s busy holding your attention every moment you’re awake. He’s making sure you’re always distracted. He’s making sure you’re fully absorbed." -- Chuck Palahniuk
